Just a question.

How do you bring an airship to a planet? You inflate it?

You normally want one of the inflatable envelopes (Ray, Una, Cirrus) and deliver it by rocket in the usual way. In certain cases you can actually SSTO an airship, but it's typically problematic -- the airship envelope becomes an impediment to gaining horizontal speed well before it stops being a significant contribution to vertical speed, i.e. it's a great help to getting off a planet provided you're ready to get rid of the airship part.

Decoupling envelopes is a great way to get off Eve, though.
